name: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS
description: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (Jammy Jellyfish) is the latest long-term support release of the popular Linux distribution. This version brings the latest open-source software advancements and is designed for both personal and professional use. It features the GNOME 42 desktop environment with a refined user interface for an optimal user experience. Ubuntu 22.04 LTS offers extensive hardware support, advanced security features, and the ability to run a wide range of software applications. It includes the latest updates, bug fixes, and new features, making it a reliable choice for servers, desktops, and development environments. With five years of security updates and support, Ubuntu 22.04 LTS ensures long-term stability and performance.

name: Fedora 38 Workstation
description: Fedora 38 Workstation is the latest release in the Fedora project, offering a cutting-edge Linux experience for developers, professionals, and enthusiasts. It comes with the GNOME 44 desktop environment, featuring a modern and streamlined interface that enhances productivity and ease of use. Fedora 38 Workstation is designed for high performance and includes the latest software updates, development tools, and support for a wide range of hardware. It emphasizes stability and security, making it an excellent choice for development workstations and power users. With its commitment to open-source innovation, Fedora 38 Workstation provides a robust and flexible platform for a variety of computing needs.
